title: Claude 4 and Enhanced Constitutional AI
summary: We're excited to announce Claude 4, trained with improved safety alignment techniques. The model shows strong performance on reasoning tasks while maintaining robust safety properties.
author: Anthropic Safety Team

title: Weight Security Best Practices: Protecting Frontier Models
summary: We're sharing our approach to model weight security, including hardware security modules (HSMs) and secure enclaves for protecting model parameters.
author: Anthropic Security
